REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0370 reute u f BC-BELGIUM-TO-ISSUE-GOLD 04-09 0042

TEXT.TITLE: BELGIUM TO ISSUE GOLD WARRANTS, SOURCES SAY
TEXT.BODY: Belgium plans to issue Swiss franc warrants to buy gold, with Credit Suisse as lead manager, market sources said. No confirmation or further details were immediately available. REUTER
